statements: DELETE FROM movies WHERE director = 'James Cameron';
DELETE FROM movies WHERE director = 'Christopher Nolan';
DELETE FROM movies WHERE genre = 'Action' AND release_date < '2000-01-01';
DELETE FROM movies WHERE duration > 150 AND average_rating < 7.5;
DELETE FROM movies WHERE release_year < 2000 AND genre = 'Action';
DELETE FROM movies WHERE runtime_minutes >= 120 OR release_year <= 2010;
DELETE FROM user_ratings WHERE rating < 5 AND timestamp < '2020-01-01';
DELETE FROM user_ratings WHERE rating < 3.0 AND timestamp > '2021-06-30';
DELETE FROM MovieMetadata WHERE release_year < 2010 AND rating < 7
DELETE FROM UserRatings WHERE rating < (SELECT AVG(rating) FROM UserRatings) AND timestamp < '2021-01-01'
DELETE FROM UserAccounts WHERE last_login < '2020-01-01' AND join_date < '2019-01-01'
